page.title: 08Family Life:-A typical day
page.content: On Wednesday,we all got up at 6.45 in the morning and had our breakfast. Mum prepared some sandwiches and we put our fishing gear in the car.At 8.50 we went into Camborne and we bought some live bait. Then we went to Gwithian beach and we set up our fishing rods. It was very cold on the beach so after we had collected some mussels we went back to the car with some things from the beach. At noon we had our lunch and then we went to Newlyn and began to fish on the pebbled beach. At 3.20 we packed up and went home with no fish.When we got home we sorted out our things.Some floats and weights had been lost while fishing. Mum and dad got our dinner. Then we all sat down in the living room and watched a film on television. At 8.30 we had our supper and went to bed.
